verses.verse: And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

Speak<WH1696> to all<WH3605> the congregation<WH5712> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and say<WH559> to them, You shall be holy:<WH6918> for I the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> am holy.<WH6918>
You shall fear<WH3372> every man<WH376> his mother,<WH517> and his father,<WH1> and keep<WH8104> my sabbaths:<WH7676> I am the LORD<WH3068> your God.<WH430>
Turn<WH6437> you not to idols,<WH457> nor<WH3808> make<WH6213> to yourselves molten<WH4541> gods:<WH430> I am the LORD<WH3068> your God.<WH430>
And if<WH3588> you offer<WH2076> a sacrifice<WH2077> of peace<WH8002> offerings to the LORD,<WH3068> you shall offer<WH2076> it at your own will.<WH7522>

It shall be eaten<WH398> the same day<WH3117> you offer<WH2077> it, and on the morrow:<WH4283> and if ought remain<WH3498> until<WH5704> the third<WH7992> day,<WH3117> it shall be burnt<WH8313> in the fire.<WH784>
And if<WH518> it be eaten<WH398> at all on the third<WH7992> day,<WH3117> it is abominable;<WH6292> it shall not be accepted.<WH7521>

Therefore every one that eats<WH398> it shall bear<WH5375> his iniquity,<WH5771> because<WH3588> he has profaned<WH2490> the hallowed<WH6944> thing of the LORD:<WH3068> and that soul<WH5315> shall be cut<WH3772> off from among his people.<WH5971>

And when you reap<WH7114> the harvest<WH7105> of your land,<WH776> you shall not wholly<WH3615> reap the corners<WH6285> of your field,<WH7704> neither shall you gather<WH3950> the gleanings<WH3951> of your harvest.<WH7105>

And you shall not glean<WH5953> your vineyard,<WH3754> neither<WH3808> shall you gather<WH3950> every grape<WH6528> of your vineyard;<WH3754> you shall leave<WH5800> them for the poor<WH6041> and stranger:<WH1616> I am the LORD<WH3068> your God.<WH430>
You shall not steal,<WH1589> neither<WH3808> deal falsely,<WH3584> neither<WH3808> lie<WH8266> one<WH376> to another.<WH5997>
And you shall not swear<WH7650> by my name<WH8034> falsely,<WH8267> neither shall you profane<WH2490> the name<WH8034> of your God:<WH430> I am the LORD.<WH3068>

You shall not defraud<WH6231> your neighbor,<WH7453> neither<WH3808> rob<WH1497> him: the wages<WH6468> of him that is hired<WH7916> shall not abide<WH3885> with you all night until<WH5704> the morning.<WH1242>
You shall not curse<WH7043> the deaf,<WH2795> nor<WH3808> put<WH5414> a stumbling block<WH4383> before<WH6440> the blind,<WH5787> but shall fear<WH3372> your God:<WH430> I am the LORD.<WH3068>

You shall do<WH6213> no<WH3808> unrighteousness<WH5766> in judgment:<WH4941> you shall not respect<WH5375> the person<WH6440> of the poor,<WH1800> nor<WH3808> honor<WH1921> the person<WH6440> of the mighty:<WH1419> but in righteousness<WH6664> shall you judge<WH8199> your neighbor.<WH5997>

You shall not go<WH3212> up and down as a talebearer<WH7400> among your people:<WH5971> neither<WH3808> shall you stand<WH5975> against<WH5921> the blood<WH1818> of your neighbor;<WH7453> I am the LORD.<WH3068>
You shall not hate<WH8130> your brother<WH251> in your heart:<WH3824> you shall in any wise<WH3198> rebuke<WH3198> your neighbor,<WH5997> and not suffer<WH5375> sin<WH2399> on him.

You shall not avenge,<WH5358> nor<WH3808> bear<WH5201> any grudge<WH5201> against the children<WH1121> of your people,<WH5971> but you shall love<WH157> your neighbor<WH7453> as yourself: I am the LORD.<WH3068>

You shall keep<WH8104> my statutes.<WH2708> You shall not let your cattle<WH929> engender<WH7250> with a diverse<WH3610> kind: you shall not sow<WH2232> your field<WH7704> with mingled<WH3610> seed: neither<WH3808> shall a garment<WH899> mingled<WH3610> of linen<WH8162> and woolen<WH8162> come<WH5927> on you.

And whoever<WH376> <WH834> lies<WH7901> carnally<WH7902> <WH2233> with a woman,<WH802> that is a female slave,<WH8198> betrothed<WH2778> to an husband,<WH376> and not at all redeemed,<WH6299> nor<WH3808> freedom<WH2668> given<WH5414> her; she shall be scourged;<WH1244> they shall not be put to death,<WH4191> because<WH3588> she was not free.<WH2666>
And he shall bring<WH935> his trespass<WH817> offering to the LORD,<WH3068> to the door<WH6607> of the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation,<WH4150> even a ram<WH352> for a trespass<WH817> offering.

And the priest<WH3548> shall make an atonement<WH3722> for him with the ram<WH352> of the trespass<WH817> offering before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> for his sin<WH2403> which<WH834> he has done: and the sin<WH2403> which he has done shall be forgiven<WH5545> him.

And when<WH3588> you shall come<WH935> into<WH413> the land,<WH776> and shall have planted<WH5193> all<WH3605> manner of trees<WH6086> for food,<WH3978> then you shall count the fruit<WH6529> thereof as uncircumcised:<WH6189> three<WH7969> years<WH8141> shall it be as uncircumcised<WH6189> to you: it shall not be eaten<WH398> of.
But in the fourth<WH7243> year<WH8141> all<WH3605> the fruit<WH6529> thereof shall be holy<WH6944> to praise<WH1974> the LORD<WH3068> with.
And in the fifth<WH2549> year<WH8141> shall you eat<WH398> of the fruit<WH6529> thereof, that it may yield<WH3254> to you the increase<WH8393> thereof: I am the LORD<WH3068> your God.<WH430>
You shall not eat<WH398> any thing with the blood:<WH1818> neither<WH3808> shall you use<WH5172> enchantment,<WH5172> nor<WH3808> observe<WH6049> times.
You shall not round<WH5362> the corners<WH6285> of your heads,<WH7218> neither<WH3808> shall you mar<WH7843> the corners<WH6285> of your beard.<WH2206>
You shall not make<WH5414> any cuttings<WH8296> in your flesh<WH1320> for the dead,<WH5315> nor<WH3808> print<WH5414> any marks<WH7085> on you: I am the LORD.<WH3068>

Do not prostitute<WH2490> your daughter,<WH1323> to cause her to be a whore;<WH2181> lest<WH3808> the land<WH776> fall to prostitution,<WH2181> and the land<WH776> become<WH4390> full<WH4390> of wickedness.<WH2154>
You shall keep<WH8104> my sabbaths,<WH7676> and reverence<WH3372> my sanctuary:<WH4720> I am the LORD.<WH3068>
Regard<WH6437> not them that have familiar spirits,<WH178> neither<WH408> seek<WH1245> after<WH413> wizards,<WH3049> to be defiled<WH2930> by them: I am the LORD<WH3068> your God.<WH430>
You shall rise<WH6965> up before<WH6440> the hoary<WH7872> head, and honor<WH1921> the face<WH6440> of the old<WH2205> man, and fear<WH3372> your God:<WH430> I am the LORD.<WH3068>
And if<WH3588> a stranger<WH1616> sojourn<WH1481> with you in your land,<WH776> you shall not vex<WH3238> him.

But the stranger<WH1616> that dwells<WH1481> with you shall be to you as one born<WH249> among<WH854> you, and you shall love<WH157> him as yourself; for you were strangers<WH1616> in the land<WH776> of Egypt:<WH4714> I am the LORD<WH3068> your God.<WH430>
You shall do<WH6213> no<WH3808> unrighteousness<WH5766> in judgment,<WH4941> in length,<WH4060> in weight,<WH4948> or in measure.<WH4884>

Just<WH6664> balances,<WH3976> just<WH6664> weights,<WH68> a just<WH6664> ephah,<WH374> and a just<WH6664> hin,<WH1969> shall you have:<WH1961> I am the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430> which<WH834> brought<WH3318> you out of the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>
Therefore shall you observe<WH8104> all<WH3605> my statutes,<WH2708> and all<WH3605> my judgments,<WH4941> and do<WH6213> them: I am the LORD.<WH3068>
